about.title: About
about.subtitle: We're a passionate team of developers, designers, and innovators dedicated to creating exceptional appointment booking experiences that drive real business results.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.p1: It all started in late 2024, in the heart of Prishtina, Kosovo. Five passionate developers sat in a small café, frustrated by the endless phone calls and missed appointments they witnessed businesses struggling with every day. "There has to be a better way," said Etrit, and that spark of an idea would soon become Appointly-ks.
ourStory.p2: What began as late-night coding sessions and endless cups of coffee quickly evolved into something bigger. Lerdi brought his expertise in AI integration, dreaming of a chatbot that could handle bookings as naturally as a human receptionist. Fatlum, Jasin, and Marjan worked tirelessly on building a rock-solid backend that could handle thousands of appointments without breaking a sweat.
ourStory.p3: We started with a simple question:
ourStory.p3Highlight: "What if booking an appointment was as easy as sending a text?"
ourStory.p3End: Months of development, countless iterations, and hundreds of cups of coffee later, we had our answer. Appointly-ks was born – a platform that doesn't just schedule appointments, but transforms how businesses connect with their customers.
ourStory.p4: Today, we're proud to serve businesses across Kosovo and beyond, helping them save time, reduce no-shows, and focus on what they do best. But we're just getting started. Every day, we're working to make Appointly-ks smarter, faster, and more intuitive. Because for us, this isn't just a project – it's our mission to make scheduling effortless for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses of all sizes with intuitive scheduling tools that save time, reduce no-shows, and enhance customer satisfaction. We believe every minute saved on scheduling is a minute gained for what truly matters – serving your customers.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the most trusted appointment management platform in the region, known for innovation, reliability, and exceptional user experience. We're building a future where scheduling is so seamless, it becomes invisible.

values.clientDesc: Your success is our success. We build lasting partnerships.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Appointly-ks ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our appointment booking platform.

informationCollected.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollected.personalInfoDesc: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
personalInfoItems: Name, email address, and phone number
Payment information (processed securely through third-party payment processors)
Communications with us, including customer support inquiries
autoCollectedItems: Device information (IP address, browser type, operating system)
Usage data (pages visited, time spent, features used)

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our appointment booking services
Process appointments and send confirmations
Send automated notifications via email and SMS
Provide customer support and respond to inquiries
Process payments and prevent fraud
Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience
Send marketing communications (with your consent)
Comply with legal obligations
Improve our AI-powered features and recommendations

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.intro: We may share your information with:
items: Service Providers: Third-party companies that help us operate our platform
Business Partners: When you book appointments with businesses using our platform
Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
sharing.noSell: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices

Opt-out of marketing communications

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your information within 30 days, except where retention is required by law.

international.title: 8. International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, smartphone, or tablet) when you visit our website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to the owners of the site. Appointly-ks uses cookies to enhance your experience and improve our services.

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.intro: We use cookies for several important reasons:
items: To keep you signed in to your account
To remember your preferences and settings
To understand how you use our platform
To improve the performance and functionality of our services
To provide personalized content and recommendations
To analyze traffic and user behavior
To enhance security and prevent fraud

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility. You cannot opt-out of these cookies.
items: Session Cookies: Keep you logged in during your visit
Authentication Cookies: Verify your identity and access rights
Security Cookies: Protect against fraudulent activity

performance.title: Performance and Analytics Cookies
performance.content: These cookies collect information about how visitors use our website, such as which pages are visited most often and if error messages are received. This helps us improve how our website works.
items: Google Analytics: Tracks website usage and generates statistics
Performance Monitoring: Identifies technical issues and errors
Usage Tracking: Analyzes feature adoption and user behavior

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.content: These cookies allow our website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, personalized features.
items: Preference Cookies: Remember your settings and preferences
Language Cookies: Store your language selection
Display Cookies: Remember your display preferences (theme, layout)

targeting.title: Targeting and Advertising Cookies
targeting.content: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant content.
items: Marketing Cookies: Track your visits across websites
Social Media Cookies: Enable sharing on social platforms
Retargeting Cookies: Show relevant ads on other websites

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.intro: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies. These services include:
items: Google Analytics: For website analytics and insights
Payment Processors: For secure payment processing
Email Services: For sending transactional emails
Social Media Platforms: For social sharing and login features
AI Services: For powering our AI chat assistance
thirdParty.note: These third parties have their own privacy policies and cookie policies. We recommend reviewing them.

duration.title: 5. Cookie Duration
duration.sessionContent: These temporary cookies are deleted when you close your browser. They help maintain your session while browsing our website.
duration.persistentContent: These cookies remain on your device for a set period (ranging from days to years) or until you delete them. They help us recognize you when you return to our website.

managing.title: 6. Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managing.browserIntro: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can:
browserItems: View what cookies are stored and delete them individually
Delete all cookies when you close your browser
managing.browserInstructions: To manage cookies in popular browsers:
managing.chromeInstructions: Chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies and other site data
managing.firefoxInstructions: Firefox: Options → Privacy & Security → Cookies and Site Data
managing.safariInstructions: Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Manage Website Data
managing.edgeInstructions: Edge: Settings → Cookies and site permissions → Cookies and data stored
managing.optOutContent: You can opt-out of specific tracking services
